newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: Mauritius rupee firms vs dollar, weakens vs stg.
newsitem.headline: Mauritius rupee firms vs dollar, weakens vs stg.

text.p: The Mauritian rupee firmed against the dollar and weakened against sterling on Wednesday reflecting international trends, foreign exchange dealers said.
The rupee was fixed at a commercial mean rate of 20.4445 to the dollar from 20.4705 on Tuesday, and at a commercial mean rate of 33.364 against the sterling from 33.2245 on Tuesday.
Forex dealers said that the central bank had been seen selling dollars on the foreign exchange interbank market at the prevailing interbank rate on Tuesday mid afternoon.
"Despite (the) central bank's interventions on Monday and Tuesday, commercial banks are still having hard currency shortage positions," a dealer said.
